Package MazeApp

Interface IMazeDataSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
DBMazeDataSource
public interface IMazeDataSource
Provides all Maze DB functionality required by the app

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    addMaze(Maze maze)
    Adds Maze to Database
    void
    close()
    Safely closes connection to ensure data is saved

    Deletes Maze from Database
    Maze

    Retrieves single maze from the DB

  • Method Details

    • addMaze

      int addMaze(Maze maze)
      Adds Maze to Database
      Parameters:
      maze - the full maze object to insert
      Returns:
      int of ID insert maze, or 0 if failed

    • updateMaze

      boolean updateMaze(Maze maze)
      Updates Maze in Database
      Parameters:
      maze - the full maze object to update
      Returns:
      boolean depending on successful result

    • deleteMaze

      boolean deleteMaze(int ID)
      Deletes Maze from Database
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID of the maze to delete
      Returns:
      boolean depending on successful result

    • getMaze

      Maze getMaze(int ID)
      Retrieves single maze from the DB
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID of the maze to retrieve
      Returns:
      requested maze object

    • getMazeList

      Object[][] getMazeList()
      Retrieves partial Mazes from DB Note this is a basic list of names/IDs only for the index. Use getMaze() to obtain a complete object.
      Returns:
      Object array of Mazes from the DB.

    • close

      void close()
      Safely closes connection to ensure data is saved
